Class MapReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.MapReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMapReader

    public class MapReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMapReader
    Esta classe é responsável pela leitura em JSON e sua respetiva conversão para um grafo e informação de jogo

      • loadMapFromJSON

        public boolean loadMapFromJSON(java.lang.String path)
        Description copied from interface: IMapReader
        This method shall load the JSON information and parse it into the MapModel in order to load the game information and Rooms to be loaded into the Graph
        Specified by:
        loadMapFromJSON in interface IMapReader
        Parameters:
        path - variable which shall contain the path to the specified *.json file
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to load the Map, false if otherwise

      • loadGameInformation

        public GameNetwork<java.lang.String> loadGameInformation(int difficulty,
                                                         java.lang.String initialPosition)
        Carrega, para um grafo específico, toda a informação necessária ao para o início do jogo.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - dificuldade do jogo
        initialPosition - posição inicial do jogador
        Returns:
        instancia do grafo do jogo

      • loadGraphWithRoom

        public GameNetwork<java.lang.String> loadGraphWithRoom(ArrayUnorderedList<RoomModel> roomModels)
        Description copied from interface: IMapReader
        This method shall return a Network Oriented Graph containing a modeled version of the Map. Each node/vertex symbolizes a room. Each edge contains the "phantom's" information, 0 if there is none, or any positive integer if it exists (weight of the network)
        Specified by:
        loadGraphWithRoom in interface IMapReader
        Parameters:
        roomModels - The List Containing the RoomModels
        Returns:
        the Network Oriented Graph loaded with Rooms and their weights
